name: Nexocial
overview:
Nexocial provides secure social corporate networking software for large and medium-sized companies

Nexocial her core product is weConnect, a social corporate network software build on Microsoft Sharepoint 2007 and Sharepoint 2010. weConnect is a full suite of tools that empower employees to communicate and collaborate and engagement within the enterprise. Combining smart technology from the internet and a redifined Hybrid approach of Cloud computing, we primarily serve European and Chinese customers with our solutions, lowering their cost and increasing their productivity. With our experienced team of developers and our strong management board we connect and serve thousands of people and are agressively growing in the European marketplace.

With offices in Amsterdam, Chengdu and Hong Kong we have access to talents all over the world, getting the right resources from the right locations.

offices.address1: Gao Xin Qu - Fu Hua Yuan 2015

video_embeds.description: Vincent Everts interviews Hugo Leijtens CEO Nexocial about Enterprise 2.0 and China
